rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with ample natural light via floor-to-ceiling windows, adhering to Vastu principles by ensuring a calm energy at the entry.
Spacious living area with west-facing large windows for ventilation and light. The room's layout follows Vastu guidelines for social spaces.
Adjacent to the kitchen, designed with east-west alignment for balanced energy flow as per Vastu norms.
Modern kitchen design that maximizes space and light. The placement considers the auspicious direction for food preparation.
Well-ventilated guest room with privacy, designed following Vastu guidelines by having an east or north wall alignment.
The main bedroom features a serene setting enhanced by floor-to-ceiling windows. The room placement respects Vastu recommendations for master occupancy.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling west-facing windows in living area and master bedroom, ensuring ample daylight while maintaining privacy.
Main entrance door facing north as per Vastu norms to welcome positive energy.
A central courtyard provides natural light and ventilation, with openings that facilitate a seamless flow between interior spaces.
